channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Day Day Thomas powerful drive towards the basket extends Cincinnati's lead over No. 8 Houston
item.description: Day Day Thomas powerful drive towards the basket extended the Cincinnati Bearcats' lead over No. 8 Houston Cougars.

item.title: Xavier's Tre Carroll drives baseline for STRONG poster finish vs. DePaul
item.description: Xavier's Tre Carroll drove baseline for STRONG poster finish vs. DePaul.

item.title: Brandon Maclin drives middle for TOUGH finish and the foul, giving DePaul the lead over Xavier
item.description: Brandon Maclin drove middle for TOUGH finish and the foul, giving DePaul the lead over Xavier.

item.title: Stefan Vaaks Scores 15 Second-Half Points in Providence Comeback Over St. John's
item.description: Stefan Vaaks scored 15 second-half points, as Providence rallied to beat St. John's despite Zuby Ejiofor's 33-point performance.

item.title: Panthers vs. Buccaneers Week 18 Live Score, Updates: NFC South Title On the Line
item.description: The stakes are high for this Week 18 NFC South showdown, as the Panthers and Bucs square off to determine a division champion.

item.title: Race for the NFC's No. 1 seed: Biggest questions for Seahawks-49ers
item.description: Both teams are treating Saturday as a playoff game with the No. 1 seed's playoff bye week on the line.

item.title: 49ers' 'For the Faithful' look tops NFL Week 18 uniforms
item.description: The final week of the regular season doesn't mean NFL teams are keeping it simple for their wardrobes.

item.title: Big 12: 11 potential (and probable) tournament teams
item.description: Four Final Four contenders. Two more tournament-bound teams. And five trending toward the bubble.

item.title: SEC: 11 tournament hopefuls, with one unexpected Final Four candidate
item.description: The SEC may not be able to replicate last season's success, but the March Madness potentials field remains strong.

item.title: Most fashionable arrivals of NFL Week 18, featuring Bryce Young
item.description: Before the Week 18 NFL slate kicked off, players made sure to put their most fashionable foot forward.
